TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PixelCopy extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: Provides a mechanisms to issue pixel copy requests to allow for copy operations from Surface to Bitmap

remarks.para: Provides a mechanisms to issue pixel copy requests to allow for copy operations from Surface to Bitmap
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Views.PixelCopyResult enum directly instead of this field.", true)]
[<System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Views.PixelCopyResult enum directly instead of this field.", true)>]

Docs.summary: The destination isn't a valid copy target.

remarks.para: The destination isn't a valid copy target. If the destination is a bitmap this can occur if the bitmap is too large for the hardware to copy to. It can also occur if the destination has been destroyed.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

[<System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Views.PixelCopyResult enum directly instead of this field.", true)>]

Docs.summary: It is not possible to copy from the source.

remarks.para: It is not possible to copy from the source. This can happen if the source is hardware-protected or destroyed.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

[<System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Views.PixelCopyResult enum directly instead of this field.", true)>]

Docs.summary: The source has nothing to copy from.

remarks.para: The source has nothing to copy from. When the source is a Surface this means that no buffers have been queued yet. Wait for the source to produce a frame and try again.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

.method public static hidebysig void Request(class Android.Views.Surface source, class Android.Graphics.Bitmap dest, class Android.Views.PixelCopy/IOnPixelCopyFinishedListener listener, class Android.OS.Handler listenerThread) cil managed
static member Request : Android.Views.Surface * Android.Graphics.Bitmap * Android.Views.PixelCopy.IOnPixelCopyFinishedListener * Android.OS.Handler -> unit

Docs.param: The source from which to copy
The destination of the copy. The source will be scaled to match the width, height, and format of this bitmap.
Callback for when the pixel copy request completes
The callback will be invoked on this Handler when the copy is finished.
Docs.summary: Requests a copy of the pixels from a Surface to be copied into a provided Bitmap.

format.a: Java documentation for android.view.PixelCopy.request(android.view.Surface, android.graphics.Bitmap, android.view.OnPixelCopyFinishedListener, android.os.Handler).
